abstract: The company plans to eliminate 3,300 jobs and close as many as six plants in an attempt to cut costs and refocus efforts on stabilizing its domestic beverage business.
snippet: The company plans to eliminate 3,300 jobs and close as many as six plants in an attempt to cut costs and refocus efforts on stabilizing its domestic beverage business.
lead_paragraph: Tap water is making a comeback. That’s bad news for PepsiCo’s profits.

headline.main: Tap Water’s Popularity Forces Pepsi to Cut Jobs
headline.print_headline: Tap Water’s Popularity Forces Pepsi To Cut Jobs
